use_original.description: Skip the image service. Suitable for SVG images

width.description: This will set a max width on the image and a small margin bottom.

height.description: Deprecated. If you want to set a custom size use the Width field instead.

browser_bar.description: Display a browser bar above the image. Leave blank to hide it.

browser_bar_address.description: This is the text in the browser's address bar. Leave it empty to have the default "storyblok.com".

note.description: Just a note that you can use to give information to the Design Team - will not be displayed in the frontend.

given_name.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

family_name.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

discord_account.description: Your discord user ID, which you can get by clicking on the three dots next to your profile and selecting the "Copy User ID" option.

enable_outline.description: Adds a white outline around each avatar.

headline.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

video_url.description: This must be a youtube embed URL. For example https://www.youtube.com/embed/ISoCH96q5Cs

spacing.description: Padding top and bottom of the group

row.description: Bloks are placed next to each other instead of stacked on top of one another.

category.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

title.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

cta.description: *WARNING* This field will be used with the newcoming blog layout.

noindex.description: Hide this entry from search engines and from the internal search

alternative_headline.description: The headline entered here will be made visible while hovering over the box. Can only be enabled after choosing "Portrait Images" as the image size from the "Style" tab in the Boxes Slider.

preselected_countries.description: Warning: This is temporarily stored on an external JSON. We may evaluate to move it to a Datasource instead.

enable_diff.description: Use "-" for deletions and "+" for additions at the start of the lines

language.description: Just set the language if you see the auto-detection is not working.

link_new_tab.display_name: Open link in a new tab

headline.description: Deprecated

link_new_tab.display_name: Open link in a new tab

show_more.description: This hides the bottom row of logos and adds a "Show More" button to reveal them when clicked.

cta.description: Adds a button CTA to the bottom of the container. If "Show More" is enabled, this button will be placed next to the "Show More" button, also at the bottom of the container.

headline.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

name.description: This is the actual name of the field. It will be used to send it to the backend and retrieve the provided data.

label.description: This label defines what the set of radio buttons or checkboxes represent.

required.description:
If switched on, the user will need to select at least one option from the group. 
Does NOT work with checkboxes, please use the multiselect instead.

fields.description: Each Dynamic Form Field item added here represents a radio button, checkbox, or option in a single-/multi-select, depending on what is selected in the "Type" field above.
Use Dynamic Form Field Group if you need a set of options, like radio buttons, checkboxes or single-/multi-dropdowns. Otherwise, use Dynamic Form Field.

variant.description: The default value is 'Default' and has no effect on the styling. The 'New Homepage Style' variant applies styling specific to an upcoming Homepage design update.

name.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

industry.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

featured.description: Make this entry rank at the top of the list of the case studies listing when some filters are selected.

noindex.description: Hide this entry from search engines and from the internal search

gated_content_title.description: If not provided, the gated content OG Title will be used instead.

gated_content_description.description: If not provided, the gated content OG Description will be used instead.

gated_content_cta.description: If no CTA is provided, the "Download" button will be displayed.

personalized.description: Select this to to make the website fetch the industry from the user's data coming from a form (just for thank you landing pages)

tracking_category.description: Filling this form will make Segment track click events on this button

headline.description: Only available for screenreaders

top_image_style.description: The effects of these options depend on the icon or image being uploaded. If choosing one distorts your asset, selecting the other option should render it as intended. The default value is Stretched.

headline.description: This field may be used to render an H1 title

noindex.description: Hide this entry from search engines and from the internal search

headline.description: Deprecated

price_information.description: Place two currency tags [currency] around the value where you want the site to inject the currency for you. Example [currency]9[currency]/month.

features.description:
- For text that should appear below a feature in a smaller size, wrap it in a snippet as follows:
[small] This text will now appear beneath a bullet point in a smaller font size [/small]

- Place two currency tags [currency] around the value where you want the site to inject the currency for you. Example [currency]9[currency]/month.

text_price.description: If you fill this, it will take priority over the numeric price

monthly_price.description: Price if billed monthly. Please don't use commas, the price will be formatted automatically.

annual_price.description: Monthly price if billed annually. Please don't use commas, the price will be formatted automatically.

headline.description: Screenreader only.

enable_transparent_background.description: Please use this option OR the custom background option - both cannot be enabled at the same time.

headline.description: Screenreader only.

quotes.description: By default filled with random quotes. Use specific quotes for use-cases or context sensitive content.

custom_image_size.description: Please choose "Custom" from the Style Size field in order to be able to set a custom image size through this field. Please include 'px'. Example: 150px

text.display_name: Text - Deprecated, please use the Content field instead

image_preload.description: If you're using an SVG you can use this to define a blurred preview image

headline.description: This field is used to render an H1 title
Screenreader only.

title.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

tito_event_name.description:
Add the Event Name registered in Tito.
Example `beyondtellerrand/stories-on-the-road`

tito_event_releases.description:
List all the event releases that you want to list in the Tito Widget, separated by a comma.
Please don't add spaces between the list values.
You don't need to add a comma if there is only one release.
Example: `smw3dolmnla,iy5fmx5ggk0`

unlisted.description: The event won't be included in the listing

hide_time.description: Select this to hide the time in both the listing and detail page. Only the date will be shown

enable_external_link.description: Open an external page defined in the "External link" field

noindex.description: Hide this entry from search engines and from the internal search

badge.description: This field adds a small, pill-shaped green badge next to (after) the link, displaying the number entered here followed by a plus sign (+).

headline.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

title.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

headline.description: Optional: Override the default "Read <Title>" headline in the form with custom content.

download.description: File that will be downloaded. Make sure to select "download" as type.

redirect_to.description: Target for the redirect after entering the details.

tracking_pixel_url.description: The URL for the tracking pixel to load after the form submission

event_label.description: Fill out this field to setup the tracking of the "view" and "submit" events for this form in Analytics

text_direct.description: Replace the page intro text with the above once the form has been submitted

headline.description:
This field is used to render an H1 title

Snippets:
[rotating]Some words here[/rotating]: rotating words, in combination with the rotating options field

[color]Some words here[/color]: teal green text

[sameline]Some words here[/sameline]: keep words on the same line

rotating_text_options.description: Comma separated list of words for the rotating text

video_url.description: This must be a youtube embed URL. For example https://www.youtube.com/embed/ISoCH96q5Cs

label.description: Use a custom label. Default: Cyan (Hint), Blue (Learn), Red (Required), Yellow (Warn).

reverse_columns_mobile.description: Toggling this option will reverse the order of link board columns on smaller screens. The desktop view will remain unaffected.

all_presets.name: Technologies
all_presets.description: Each Storyblok SDK occupies a tab with content comprised of helpful links and code samples to guide users on the different integrations available.

techs_skills.description: Comma separated value where each value will be displayed as tag. Example: Vue.js, Ruby on Rails, Node.js, ...

title.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

noindex.description: Tick this to hide this entry from Google and from the internal search

image_position.description: The image can be positioned at the bottom right corner, or in the center. The default positioning is in the center.

headline.description: Line breaks can be used for the headline

text.description:
If you want to edit existing richtext content open the below "deprecated" group.

If you want to use Richtext please use the Richtext instead of the Markdown component.

group_link.description: Adds a link at the bottom of the group

text.description:
It will be displayed in the box if you don't add an image. If you add an image it will be used as alt text.
Wrap text in [light][/light] tag to apply a light color. Example: [light]This text is light[/light]

internal_search_keywords.description: Comma separated list of keywords fow which you want to feature this entry in the internal search

headline.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

escape_html.description: If set to true, HTML tags in the headline will appear as they are, and the snippet options won't work.

enable_animation.description: The animation is specific to the image added to this blok. It is triggered as you scroll down, "folding up" the image as you keep scrolling.

video_url.description: This must be a youtube embed URL. For example https://www.youtube.com/embed/ISoCH96q5Cs

image_preload.description: If you're using an SVG you can use this to define a blurred preview image

partner_id.description: The name of the partner is used to render an H1 title

source_name.description: The name of the external source

active.description: Make this tab open by default. Make sure it's not ticked on other tabs too

price_information_subtitle.description: Place two currency tags [currency] around the value where you want the site to inject the currency for you. Example [currency]9[currency]/month.

features.description: Place two currency tags [currency] around the value where you want the site to inject the currency for you. Example [currency]9[/currency]/month.

tech.description: Select "None" if your article is just about Storyblok or in case it's not about a specific tech. We are not allowing this field empty just to make sure nobody forgets :-)

title.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

noindex.description: Hide this entry from search engines and from the internal search

headline.description: Used for screen reader only.

body.description: To add Use Cases for this technology partner, use the blocks group component and add an intro component for the headline, and a custom boxes grid component with the small boxes for the containers.

short_description.description: This description will be used when displaying the partner card in the Technology Partners Listing page.

headline.description: This field is used to render an H1 title

intro_text.description: Displayed at the top, bold font

footer_text.description: Displayed below the rest, smaller font

headline.description: Wrap your text with [color][/color] to apply the accent color to it. Es: Redefine [color]Fast[/color]
This field is used to render an H1 title

The following snippet colorizes the words that you put in between, according to the accent color defined in the Style tab: 
[color] some example words that are now colorized. [/color]

escape_html.description: If set to true, HTML tags in the headline will appear as they are, and the snippet options won't work.

right_side_content.description: Defines what is displayed on the right side, the content itself can be added from the Options tab.

compact.description: Removes the spacing at the top and at the bottom when multiple blocks of the same type are piled

headline.description: Wrap your text with [color][/color] to apply the accent color to it. Es: Redefine [color]Fast[/color]

ctas_stack_name.description: Change this label to reset the pageviews count for each user
